title: Override Medication from Automated Dispensing Cabinet
description: A nurse needs to pull a medication from an Automated Dispensing Cabinet (ADC) for an emergency, overriding the standard verification process.

tasks.description: Select the patient on the ADC screen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse correctly identifies the patient at the ADC.

tasks.description: Use the 'override' function to search for and select the needed medication (e.g., 'Epinephrine').
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse successfully uses the override feature to access a non-profiled medication.

tasks.description: Enter a reason for the override and retrieve the medication. The system logs the event for later review by pharmacy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Nurse obtains the medication quickly, and the high-risk transaction is logged for audit.
